page.title: 07Children's Clubs, Evesham.
page.content: I belong to a{club,}it is{Cubs.}In it we play games. We go every Monday. If you like it you get invested and you buy a uniform which is a jumper, scarf and cap and some grey trousers. We go camping and not long ago we went to London. Sometimes we cook things and eat them ourselves. When we come back from a trip we draw a picture of things we saw and do a bit of writing about it. I enjoy Cubs very much. The time we have to be there to start is six o'clock and the finishing time is half past seven so we have a lot of time to play games and draw pictures and write about things. We do a lot of things in our Cub-Scout hut.
